fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of this person's user account. This ID is unique to each app and cannot be used across different apps. [Our upgrade guide provides more information about app-specific IDs](/docs/apps/upgrading/#upgrading_v2_0_user_ids)

fields.name: about
fields.description: The About Me section of this person's profile

fields.name: age_range
fields.description: The age segment for this person expressed as a minimum and maximum age. For example, more than 18, less than 21.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: The person's bio

fields.name: birthday
fields.description: The person's birthday.  This is a fixed format string, like `MM/DD/YYYY`.  However, people can control who can see the year they were born separately from the month and day so this string can be only the year (YYYY) or the month + day (MM/DD)

fields.name: context
fields.description: Social context for this person

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The person's local currency information

fields.name: devices
fields.description: The list of devices the person is using. This will return only iOS and Android devices

fields.name: education
fields.description: The person's education

fields.name: email
fields.description: The person's primary email address listed on their profile. This field will not be returned if no valid email address is available

fields.name: favorite_athletes
fields.description: Athletes the person likes

fields.name: favorite_teams
fields.description: Sports teams the person likes

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The person's first name

fields.name: gender
fields.description: The gender selected by this person, `male` or `female`. This value will be omitted if the gender is set to a custom value

fields.name: hometown
fields.description: The person's hometown

fields.name: inspirational_people
fields.description: The person's inspirational people

fields.name: install_type
fields.description: Install type

fields.name: installed
fields.description: Is the app making the request installed?

fields.name: interested_in
fields.description: Genders the person is interested in

fields.name: is_shared_login
fields.description: Is this a shared login (e.g. a gray user)

fields.name: is_verified
fields.description: People with large numbers of followers can have the authenticity of their identity [manually verified by Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/help/196050490547892). This field indicates whether the person's profile is verified in this way. This is distinct from the `verified` field

fields.name: languages
fields.description: Facebook Pages representing the languages this person knows

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The person's last name

fields.name: link
fields.description: A link to the person's Timeline

fields.name: location
fields.description: The person's current location as entered by them on their profile. This field is not related to check-ins

fields.name: locale
fields.description: The person's locale

fields.name: meeting_for
fields.description: What the person is interested in meeting for

fields.name: middle_name
fields.description: The person's middle name

fields.name: name
fields.description: The person's full name

fields.name: name_format
fields.description: The person's name formatted to correctly handle Chinese, Japanese, or Korean ordering

fields.name: payment_pricepoints
fields.description: The person's payment pricepoints

fields.name: test_group
fields.description: Platform test group

fields.name: political
fields.description: The person's political views

fields.name: relationship_status
fields.description: The person's relationship status

fields.name: religion
fields.description: The person's religion

fields.name: security_settings
fields.description: Security settings

fields.name: significant_other
fields.description: The person's significant other

fields.name: sports
fields.description: Sports this person likes

fields.name: quotes
fields.description: The person's favorite quotes

fields.name: third_party_id
fields.description: A string containing an anonymous, but unique identifier for the person. You can use this identifier with third parties

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: The person's current timezone offset from UTC

fields.name: token_for_business
fields.description: A token that is the same across a business's apps. Access to this token requires that the person be logged into your app. This token will change if the business owning the app changes

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: Updated time

fields.name: shared_login_upgrade_required_by
fields.description: The time that the shared loginneeds to be upgraded to Business Manager by

fields.name: verified
fields.description:
Indicates whether the account has been verified. This is distinct from the `is_verified` field. Someone is considered verified if they take any of the following actions:

* Register for mobile
* Confirm their account via SMS
* Enter a valid credit card

fields.name: video_upload_limits
fields.description: Video upload limits

fields.name: viewer_can_send_gift
fields.description: Can the viewer send a gift to this person?

fields.name: website
fields.description: The person's website

fields.name: work
fields.description: Details of a person`s work experience

fields.name: public_key
fields.description: The person's PGP public key

fields.name: cover
fields.description: The person's cover photo

fields.name: id
fields.description: Page ID. No access token is required to access this field

fields.name: about
fields.description: Information about the Page

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: The access token you can use to act as the Page. Only visible to Page Admins

fields.name: ad_campaign
fields.description: The Page's currently running promotion campaign

fields.name: affiliation
fields.description: Affiliation of this person. Applicable to Pages representing people

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: App ID for app-owned Pages and app Pages

fields.name: app_links
fields.description: AppLinks data associated with the Page's URL

fields.name: artists_we_like
fields.description: Artists the band likes. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: attire
fields.description: Dress code of the business. Applicable to Restaurants or Nightlife. Can be one of Casual, Dressy or Unspecified

fields.name: awards
fields.description: The awards information of the film. Applicable to Films

fields.name: band_interests
fields.description: Band interests. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: band_members
fields.description: Members of the band. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: best_page
fields.description: The best available Page on Facebook for the concept represented by this Page. The best available Page takes into account authenticity and the number of likes

fields.name: bio
fields.description: Biography of the band. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: birthday
fields.description: Birthday of this person. Applicable to Pages representing people

fields.name: booking_agent
fields.description: Booking agent of the band. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: built
fields.description: Year vehicle was built. Applicable to Vehicles

fields.name: business
fields.description: The Business associated with this Page.  Visible only with a page access token or a user access token that has admin rights on the page

fields.name: can_checkin
fields.description: Whether this page has checkin functionality enabled

fields.name: can_post
fields.description: Whether the current session user can post on this Page

fields.name: category
fields.description: The Page's category. e.g. Product/Service, Computers/Technology

fields.name: category_list
fields.description: The Page's sub-categories

fields.name: company_overview
fields.description: The company overview. Applicable to Companies

fields.name: contact_address
fields.description: The mailing or contact address for this page. This field will be blank if the contact address is the same as the physical address

fields.name: context
fields.description: Social context for this Page

fields.name: country_page_likes
fields.description: If this is a Page in a Global Pages hierarchy, the number of people who are being directed to this Page.

fields.name: cover
fields.description: Information about the page's cover photo

fields.name: culinary_team
fields.description: Culinary team of the business. Applicable to Restaurants or Nightlife

fields.name: current_location
fields.description: Current location of the Page

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the Page

fields.name: description_html
fields.description: The description of the Page in raw HTML

fields.name: directed_by
fields.description: The director of the film. Applicable to Films

fields.name: display_subtext
fields.description: Subtext about the Page being viewed

fields.name: emails
fields.description: The emails listed in the About section of a Page

fields.name: features
fields.description: Features of the vehicle. Applicable to Vehicles

fields.name: food_styles
fields.description: The restaurant's food styles. Applicable to Restaurants

fields.name: founded
fields.description: When the company was founded. Applicable to Pages in the Company category

fields.name: general_info
fields.description: General information provided by the Page

fields.name: general_manager
fields.description: General manager of the business. Applicable to Restaurants or Nightlife

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre of the film. Applicable to Films

fields.name: global_brand_page_name
fields.description: The name of the Page with country codes appended for Global Brand Pages. Only visible to the Page admin

fields.name: global_brand_root_id
fields.description: This brand's global Root ID

fields.name: has_added_app
fields.description: Indicates whether this Page has added the app making the query in a Page tab

fields.name: leadgen_tos_accepted
fields.description: Indicates whether a user has accepted the TOS for running LeadGen Ads on the Page

fields.name: hometown
fields.description: Hometown of the band. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: hours
fields.description: Indicates a single range of opening hours for a day. Each day can have 2 different hours ranges. The keys in the map are in the form of `{day}_{number}_{status}`.  `{day}` should be the first 3 characters of the day of the week, `{number}` should be either 1 or 2 to allow for the two different hours ranges per day. `{status}` should be either `open` or `close` to delineate the start or end of a time range. An example would be `mon_1_open` with value `17:00` and `mon_1_close` with value `21:15` which would represent a single opening range of 5pm to 9:15pm on Mondays

fields.name: impressum
fields.description: Legal information about the Page publishers

fields.name: influences
fields.description: Influences on the band. Applicable to Bands

fields.name: is_always_open
fields.description: Indicates whether this location is always open

fields.name: is_community_page
fields.description: Indicates whether the Page is a community Page

fields.name: is_permanently_closed
fields.description: Whether the business corresponding to this Page is permanently closed

fields.name: is_published
fields.description: Indicates whether the Page is published and visible to non-admins

fields.name: is_unclaimed
fields.description: Indicates whether the Page is unclaimed

fields.name: is_verified
fields.description: Pages with a large number of followers can be manually verified by Facebook as [having an authentic identity](https://www.facebook.com/help/196050490547892). This field indicates whether the page is verified by this process

fields.name: link
fields.description: The Page's Facebook URL

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location of this place. Applicable to all Places

fields.name: mission
fields.description: The company mission. Applicable to Companies

fields.name: mpg
fields.description: MPG of the vehicle. Applicable to Vehicles

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the Page

fields.name: name_with_location_descriptor

fields.name: network

fields.name: event
fields.description: If this object has a place, the event associated with the place

fields.name: place
fields.description: Location associated with the video, if any.

fields.name: backdated_time
fields.description: The time when the video post was created.

fields.name: backdated_time_granularity
fields.description: Accuracy of the backdated time.

fields.name: picture
fields.description: The URL for the thumbnail picture of the video.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Video playlist ID

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: The time when the playlist was created

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the playlist

fields.name: last_modified
fields.description: The time when the contents of the playlist was last changed

fields.name: owner
fields.description: Owner of the playlist

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the playlist

fields.name: id
fields.description: The comment ID

fields.name: attachment
fields.description: Link or photo attached to the comment

fields.name: can_comment
fields.description: Whether the viewer can reply to this comment

fields.name: can_hide
fields.description: Whether the viewer can hide this comment from everyone except the comment author and the author's friends. This can only be true for comments on Page posts

fields.name: can_like
fields.description: Whether the viewer can like this comment

fields.name: can_remove
fields.description: Whether the viewer can remove this comment

fields.name: comment_count
fields.description: Number of replies to this comment

fields.name: created_time
fields.description: The time this comment was made

fields.name: from
fields.description: The profile that made this comment

fields.name: is_hidden
fields.description: Whether this comment is hidden from everyone except the comment author and the author's friends

fields.name: is_private
fields.description: Whether the comment is a private comment

fields.name: like_count
fields.description: Number of times this comment was liked

fields.name: message
fields.description: The comment text

fields.name: message_tags
fields.description: Profiles tagged in mentions in the message

fields.name: object
fields.description: The object the comment is on

fields.name: parent
fields.description: For comment replies, the comment this is a reply to

fields.name: user_likes
fields.description: Whether the viewer has liked this comment

fields.name: id
fields.description: The Group ID

fields.name: cover
fields.description: The cover photo of the Group

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the Group

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address to upload content to the Group. Only current members of the Group can use this

fields.name: icon
fields.description: The URL for the Group's icon

fields.name: link
fields.description: The Group's website

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the Group

fields.name: member_request_count
fields.description: Number of people asking to join the group.

fields.name: owner
fields.description: The profile that created this Group

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The parent Group of this Group, if it exists

fields.name: privacy
fields.description: The privacy setting of the Group

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: The last time the Group was updated (this includes changes in the Group's properties and changes in posts and comments if user can see them)

fields.name: venue
fields.description: The location for the Group

fields.name: id
fields.description: The document ID

fields.name: can_delete
fields.description: Boolean, can document be deleted by viewer

fields.name: can_edit
fields.description: Boolean, can document be edited by viewer

fields.name: created_time
fields.description: Timestamp of when the document was created

fields.name: from
fields.description: Author of the document

fields.name: icon
fields.description: Image file for document icon

fields.name: link
fields.description: URL for the document

fields.name: message
fields.description: Content of the document

fields.name: revision
fields.description: Current revision ID

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Title of the document

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: Last updated timestamp

fields.name: id
fields.description: The event ID

fields.name: category
fields.description: The category of the event

fields.name: cover
fields.description: Cover picture

fields.name: description
fields.description: Long-form description

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the event

fields.name: end_time
fields.description: End time, if one has been set

fields.name: is_viewer_admin
fields.description: Whether the viewer is admin or not

fields.name: is_page_owned
fields.description: Whether the event is created by page or not

fields.name: can_guests_invite
fields.description: Can guests invite friends

fields.name: guest_list_enabled
fields.description: Can see guest list

fields.name: name
fields.description: Event name

fields.name: owner
fields.description: The profile that created the event

fields.name: parent_group
fields.description: The group the event belongs to

fields.name: place
fields.description: Event Place information

fields.name: start_time
fields.description: Start time

fields.name: ticket_uri
fields.description: The link users can visit to buy a ticket to this event

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: Timezone

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: Last update time

fields.name: attending_count
fields.description: Number of people attending the event

fields.name: declined_count
fields.description: Number of people who declined the event

fields.name: maybe_count
fields.description: Number of people who maybe going to the event

fields.name: noreply_count
fields.description: Number of people who did not reply to the event

fields.name: interested_count
fields.description: Number of people interested in the event
